creator: dimple_rao@hotmail.com
text:
I'm trying to display a JPG image on a PDF form. I get an error which says:
Error while creating area : no protocol

This is the code I'm using
<fo:block text-align="end">
<fo:external-graphic height="109px" src="C:\Dimple\images\BANK.JPG" 
width="99px"></fo:external-graphic>Image</fo:block>

If you could let me know how I can fix this, I would really appreciate it
Thanks!
Dimple
You must supply a valid url to the image.
